item.title: Visual Studio Code Font Settings
item.description: Every time I setup a new device, one of the first applications I install is Visual Studio Code. Without fail, I always forget how to customize the font settings. Once Visual Studio Code is open, go to File > Preferences > User Settings. Then, you can override the JSON object. Remember: User Settings are per user. There’s also an option for Workspace Settings, which are useful for when you want to only affect a specific project.
